result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jason E Stone

records.addlTxt: Pre-trial conference on November 14, 2022 at 02:15 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Jason E Stone
Current: c/o Dane County Jail,   (Effective: 08-22-2022)
Prior: 615 E Washington Ave, Madison, WI 53703

Defendant Jason E Stone not in court, in custody.  Attorney Ari S Becker in court for Jason E Stone.  Attorney Kyle Olsen in court for State of Wisconsin. Defn has new case 22CF2158. Case to track with new case once bound over.
of PTC return to sender, not deliverable as addressed, unable to forward
Pre-trial conference on August 22, 2022 at 02:15 pm.
and notice of DNA and witness list - State's

Defendant in court, in custody.  Tim Helmberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Colloquy w/ defn RE: efforts made in obtaining a lawyer. Clerk emailed SPD this morning RE status of appointment; SPD confirmed defn did not want services. Defn advised he applied and qualified. Clerk contacted SPD f/w. Defn qualified for revocation. SPD to contact CT. SPD confirmed defn does qualify for this case. CT to set another PTC once SPD appoints.
Pre-trial conference on June 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

Your signature bond is set in the amount of $500 per case. You may be responsible for paying this amount if you miss a court date or do not follow conditions of your release. 
- Defendant shall not have any contact, direct or indirect, with Robert C. 
- Defendant shall not be at Burr Jones Park in Madison. 
Trial Judge - Br 5

02:38 PM Defendant in court, in custody with Attorney Erin Nagy.  Carl Jacob Lazarus appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  All parties by Zoom. The defendant was advised regarding their right to an attorney and to the SPD application process if not already represented. Defendant received a copy of the Complaint and waived reading. Court entered Not Guilty pleas as to any misdemeanor counts.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 7, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
